::DrillBit::

"KitKat saved Land Mine. She would have been doomed to torture. And she
has nearly tortured herself after doing it. You think KitKat did that
with no remorce? It has hurt her just as much. We should be morning the
loss together. Land Mine trusted us, shouldn't you?" DrillBit says,
trying to get through to the bot.
